verbs.description: [V: Descending] [ARGM-DIR: into a raging and typo - ridden tweet] , [ARG0: a ballistic President Trump] renewed his attacks on the Russia investigation , this time casting doubts about the legality of Robert Mueller 's probe into the Russian interference in the 2016 election by suggesting the special counsel “ was established based on an illegal act . ”
